channel.title: Kubernetes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Aws Cli
item.description: aws 계정 정보 조회 aws sts get-caller-identity --profile "name" kubeconfig 등록 aws eks --profile "profile name" update-kubeconfig --name "cluster name" --region ap-northeast-2

item.title: Cli
item.description: 조회(All) $ kubectl get all -n code-server NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE pod/code-server-5fc775748c-nbmsr 0/1 Init:CrashLoopBackOff 5 4m31s NAME TYPE CLUSTER-IP EXTERNAL-IP PORT(S) AGE service/code-server ClusterIP 10.79.240.159 <none> 8080/TCP 13m NAME READY UP-TO-DATE AVAILABLE AGE deployment.apps/code-server 0/1 1 0 13m NAME DESIRED CURRENT READY AGE replicaset.apps/code-server-5879f94445 0 0 0 7m13s replicaset.apps/code-server-5fc775748c 1 1 0 4m31s replicaset.apps/code-server-67d7c4f6cd 0 0 0 13m 리소스 쿼터 조회 kubectl get resourcequota -n "namespace" 컨텍스트 조회 kubectl config get-contexts 컨텍스트 사용 kubectl config use-context "context name" 클러스터명 조회 kubectl config view --minify -o jsonpath='{.
